channel.title: PROJECTS on Xiumei's Timeless Song
channel.description: Recent content in PROJECTS on Xiumei's Timeless Song

item.title: Classic Card Game with Dialogue-driven Interaction
item.description: Welcome to 24 POINTs! This is my final project for the master course Dialogue System 1, and It’s a card game with dialogue-driven interaction. Web Platform based Backend Technology Node.js (LTS version) Package Manager: Yarn Azure service for ASR&TTS&NLU Frontend Technologies JavaScript (Xstate, vue.js framework) azure.js – export relevant KEY dm.js – manage dialogue-driven interaction main.js – control the main logic and flow of the game HTML index.html – the main entry point of the application, containing the structure and layout of the web page

item.title: City Marketing Panel for an EV Brand
Text Mining and Social Network Analysis Based on Novel
item.description: Abstract The method of grass snake and gray line(“草蛇灰线法”) is a narrative technique originating from Chinese classical novels, which connects events, appearing successive characters, forming readers’expectation horizons, and suggesting the trend of plots. It has been used by a lot of literary creators to write unexpected

item.title: Data Modeling Analysis of Tesla Charging Stations
item.description: This is our group’s submission for Problem D in 2018 MCM/ICM, and it earned Meritorious Winner at last. I was responsible for the data scraping, cleaning and modeling. Background Problem D: Out of Gas and Driving on E (for electric, not empty) For both environmental and economic reasons, there is global interest in reducing the use of fossil fuels, including gasoline for cars. Whether motivated by the environment or by the economics, consumers are starting to migrate to electric vehicles.
